Comments_List: I learned about different anthropological theories related to ancient trade, how we learn about ancient trade through archaeology, and how to source obsidian samples with PXRF technology.

Strengths include the option to do a final project in obsidian sourcing, and the student presentations of readings. The course could be improved if there was more classroom discussion among students of the readings. It would also be interesting to make connections between the past and the present more frequently- how does our understanding of ancient trade inform our understanding of modern economics?
Yes I would recommend this course.
I would recommend this course to a student with an interest in ancient systems of trade, particularly those in South America, Professor Burger's primary area of research.
